intro.one: Web Developer Who Makes Technology Simple
intro.two: I help turn your ideas into websites and apps that actually work for your business.
intro.two-cn: 为创意人士提供高效、经济、自由的 Web 服务
intro.three:
Feeling overwhelmed by website technology? You're not alone.
I'm here to handle the technical stuff so you can focus on your business. Think of me as your friendly tech partner who speaks plain English and gets things done.
intro.four: Build human-centered technology that actually works.

about.title: About Panko Digital
about.body:
Panko Digital is your go-to web and application developer expert.


I make, or fix websites and apps that work perfectly for your business. I will eliminate and simplify confusing tech jargon. I will be conscious and clear about budgets and costs and keep you in the loop, delivering results that help you succeed. I've helped everyone from small startups to major brands get their digital presence right the first time. I'm based in Geelong, Australia

Mobile.techie: Custom mobile app development for iOS and Android with app store setup and user tracking
Mobile.creative: Mobile apps that your customers will love — simple, fast, and designed to help your business grow.

Games.techie: Quick game prototypes and interactive experiences with engaging user interfaces
Games.creative: Fun, engaging games and interactive experiences that keep users coming back for more

Cloud.techie: Scalable cloud hosting solutions with automatic backups and performance monitoring
Cloud.creative: Reliable online systems that grow with your business and keep your data safe and accessible

E-commerce.techie: Custom e-commerce development with payment processing and inventory management
E-commerce.creative: Online stores that make it easy for customers to buy from you — more sales, fewer abandoned carts

Signage.techie: Digital signage systems with content management and scheduling capabilities
Signage.creative: Eye-catching digital displays that get your message across clearly and grab attention

UX.techie: User experience design and prototyping with usability testing and iterative improvements
UX.creative: User-friendly design that puts your customers first -websites and apps that are easy to use and achieve your business goals

work.title: Reconnaitre
work.description: Rapid front-end development. Bootstrap 5. Responsive site for Australian Drone start up.

work.title: Bridge Alert
work.description: Firebase storage, Geofencing, Map based routing, Push notifications. Had a lot of fun prototyping, building and testing this React Native app. Launched in 2017 and gained some popularity around Australia.

work.title: Game of life
work.description: Take home coding exercise which I got a bit carried away with.

work.title: WorkSafe Projects
work.description: WorkSafe Innovation centre was a very educational experience, to go into as a software engineer. Teamed up with service designers and researchers. Interviewed injured workers. Learned the power of the double-diamond, and design workshop synthesis as part of systems thinking. Developed various tools and web apps. This one had a passwordless sign-in using AWS lambda and cognito, and was piloted by the Victorian government, helping the incapacitated in many ways.

work.title: RevitCourse
work.description: Custom-built multi-location course booking system featuring payment gateway integration and PDF certificate generation. With some customisation of the google map styling.

work.title: SLSA Surf Lifesaving Squad
work.description: Teamed up with this cool Sydney agency, and went to what is arguably the best office in Australia, the HQ of SLSA at Bondi Beach. When I made these games I decided to focus on some more hardcore software engineering principles. So I read a lot about MVC design patterns and that was fully utilised throughout the codebase. As the project code scaled it paid dividends even though it felt slower at first.

work.title: Carlton Natural Blonde
work.description: Retro Galaga. I had a wicked time smashing out the code for this in 6 days. It needed to be embedded into a larger marketing site. I was able to find all the original SFX online. It was not the full game and was not meant to be but it was a lot of fun and I later hosted it separately with it's own scoreboard API.

work.title: FLUX Clothing
work.description: My first e-commerce site - which took paypal and eWay credit card payments. Can remember that hallelujah moment when the gateway was all wired up correctly. Shopify didn't exist when I was doing this. Had some rad fun animating components for the FLUX crew.

work.title: MCG Club Songs
work.description: Started to work more on kiosk and touch screen systems. Was commissioned to add a new club song to this installation at the Australian Sports Museum. Early IOT / Electronic messaging gateway work.

work.title: MCG AFL Scoreboard System
work.description: It's not every day you're hired to build a timed interactive scoring system which generates video signals to show large sports stadium crowds. Huge application.

work.title: Milk Skincare
work.description: For the swimming legend Michael's Milk Skincare start up I was there at the outset, hand-rolled my own e-commerce system made with my Popcorn CMS. Pre-shopify. As my second e-commerce site, it helped to launch this start up. Lessons learned from doing this project are still with me to this day. Test Coverage anyone?

work.title: Lucky EOS Wires
work.description: It's not every day you're hired to build a timed interactive scoring system which generates video signals to show large sports stadium crowds. Huge application.

intro.two: 为创意人士提供高效、经济、自由的 Web 服务
intro.three: 适用于网络、商店、应用程序和业务系统的行业标准编码服务.
intro.four: 墨尔本、悉尼、吉朗自由电子商务、网络和移动软件应用程序开发人员.

about.title: 关于
about.body:
是一家针对计算机无法完成的零件的服务机构。


我们的重点是现实世界产品和尖端技术的交叉点。我们运用人工技术和分析，结合人工智能工具和软件工程最佳实践，为您的业务实现最佳系统。

让技术为您服务。我们在创建数字系统方面拥有数十年的经验。随之而来的是设计出有效、高效且具有成本效益的东西的能力。

panko 由人类运营，为人类服务…

E-commerce.creative: Shopify、Squarespace 或 Wix 商店管理

Signage.techie: 体育场和酒店场所的广播设计和标牌系统承包商。
Signage.creative: 具有内容管理功能的大屏幕显示系统

work.title: 生命的游戏
work.description: 进行家庭编码练习，我从中获得了很多乐趣。

work.title: Reconnaitre
work.description: 快速的前端开发。 Bootstrap 5. 澳大利亚无人机初创公司的响应式网站.

work.title: 桥梁警报
work.description: Firebase 存储、地理围栏、基于地图的路由、推送通知。有很多有趣的原型设计、构建和测试这个 React Native 应用程序。于 2017 年推出，并在澳大利亚各地获得了一定的知名度。

work.title: Lucky EOS 线框
work.description: Panko 受委托为加密百家乐游戏制作一些线框。后来为真实游戏开发了一些 React FE 组件布局
